!pip install web3
import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)
import json
import requests
from web3 import Web3
# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

b = requests.get('https://api.flipsidecrypto.com/api/v2/queries/61a5c28a-4cae-4ff7-8d3e-4eded1bbeab3/data/latest')
ethereum_addresses = pd.DataFrame(b.json())




infura_url = 'https://mainnet.infura.io/v3/dec6fa3a3fbf4a628057229bfa0a8046'
w3 = Web3(Web3.HTTPProvider(infura_url))

# delegator_address = Web3.toChecksumAddress(delegator_address)

# totalSupply = stk_contract.functions.getDelegateeByType(delegator_address,1).call()
address_list = []
THOR_balance = []
vXRUNE_balance = []
XRUNE_balance = []


for index,row in ethereum_addresses[['ADDRESS']].iterrows():
    #print('For address: ',row['Address'])
    print('For index: ', index)
    address = Web3.toChecksumAddress(row['ADDRESS'])
    address_list.append(row['ADDRESS'])
    THOR_balance.append(THOR_contract.functions.balanceOf(address).call()/1e18)
    vXRUNE_balance.append(vXRUNE_contract.functions.balanceOf(address).call()/1e18)
    XRUNE_balance.append(XRUNE_contract.functions.balanceOf(address).call()/1e18)
    
        #print(row['Address'])

balance_dict = {'Address': address_list, 'THOR balance': THOR_balance, 'vXRUNE balance': vXRUNE_balance, 'XRUNE balance': XRUNE_balance,} 
balance = pd.DataFrame(balance_dict)
#balance.sort_values(by='Balance', ascending=False, inplace=True)

balance.to_csv('balance.csv', index=False)
